Class CSVFileManager

java.lang.Object
CSVFileManager
public class CSVFileManager extends Object
This class is responsible for reading and writing to CSV files.

  • Method Details

    • createCSVFile

      public static int createCSVFile(String fileName)
      This method creates a CSV file if it does not exist.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      Returns:
      0 if the file was created successfully, 1 if the file was not created successfully and -1 for any other error.

    • addLineToCSVFile

      public static int addLineToCSVFile(String fileName, String line)
      This method adds a line to a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      line - The line to be added to the CSV file.
      Returns:
      0 if the line was added successfully, 1 if the line was not added successfully and -1 for any other error.

    • checkIfLineExistsInCSVFile

      public static boolean checkIfLineExistsInCSVFile(String fileName, int idNumber)
      This method checks if a line exists in a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      idNumber - The id number of the line to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the line exists in the CSV file, false for any other error / reason.

    • checkIfLineExistsInCSVFile

      public static boolean checkIfLineExistsInCSVFile(String fileName, String id)
      This method checks if a line exists in a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      id - The id of the line to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the line exists in the CSV file, false for any other error / reason.

    • getLineFromCSVFile

      public static String getLineFromCSVFile(String fileName, int idNumber)
      This method gets a line from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      idNumber - The id number of the line to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The line if it exists in the CSV file, null for any other error / reason.

    • getLineFromCSVFile

      public static String getLineFromCSVFile(String fileName, String idNumber)
      This method gets a line from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      idNumber - The id number of the line to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The line if it exists in the CSV file, null for any other error / reason.

    • removeLineFromCSVFile

      public static int removeLineFromCSVFile(String fileName, int idNumber)
      This method removes a line from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      idNumber - The id number of the line to be removed.
      Returns:
      0 if the line was removed successfully, 1 if the line was not removed successfully and -1 for any other error.

    • removeLineFromCSVFile

      public static int removeLineFromCSVFile(String fileName, String idNumber)
      This method removes a line from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file.
      idNumber - The id number of the line to be removed.
      Returns:
      0 if the line was removed successfully, 1 if the line was not removed successfully and -1 for any other error.
